Name: Ani
description:
Ani is hoping to become a vendor at her local market, sharing her home-grown root crops, and vegetables with prospective buyers daily. She has become passionate about organic goods and hopes to turn this passion into an income generating business.

Ani is seeking a loan to buy seedlings, farming tools, to begin her business immediately. She has 4 children to provide for and is confident that this business will have a positive financial impact on her family.
